articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets Omani Sultan
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets Omani Sultan 
 Pyongyang, November 17 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Tuesday sent a message of greetings to Qaboos Bin Said, sultan of Oman, on the occasion of the 39th national day.
					 Expressing belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the DPRK and Oman would continue to favorably develop, the message wished the sultan success in his work for building modern and prosperous Oman.

articles.title: KPA Political Officials Delegation Leaves for China
articles.content:
KPA Political Officials Delegation Leaves for China
 Pyongyang, November 17 (KCNA) -- A delegation of political officials of the Korean People's Army led by Kim Jong Gak, first vice-director of the KPA General Political Bureau, left here Tuesday to visit China.

articles.title: DPRK Delegations to Visit Various Countries
articles.content:
DPRK Delegations to Visit Various Countries
 Pyongyang, November 17 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Workers' Party of Korea headed by Pak Kyong Son, vice department director of its Central Committee, left here on Tuesday to attend the 11th international meeting of communist and workers' parties to be held in New Delhi.
					 The delegation is also to visit Nepal and Cambodia.
					
					 Also departing from here Tuesday was a delegation of the DPRK Ministry of People's Security led by Vice-Minister Ho Yong Ho to participate in the 1st global ministerial conference on road safety to be held in Russia.

articles.title: Russian Government Donate Food to DPRK
articles.content:
Russian Government Donate Food to DPRK
 Pyongyang, November 17 (KCNA) -- The Russian government's donation of food to the DPRK has been completed.
					 The recent food donation is an expression of the traditional friendly relations between the two governments and peoples.

articles.title: Joint Appeal Released by Inter-Korean Organizations
articles.content:
Joint Appeal Released by Inter-Korean Organizations
 Pyongyang, November 17 (KCNA) -- The Council for the Reunification of Tangun's Nation of the north side and the Council for the Peaceful Reunification of Tangun's Nation of the south side Tuesday issued a joint appeal, 104 years after the fabrication of the "Ulsa (1905) Five-point Treaty" by the Japanese imperialists.
					The appeal said that the Korean nation with a long history of 5,000 years had been totally deprived of the country's sovereignty and forced into slavery under the harsh colonial rule of the Japanese imperialists since they faked up the above-said illegal and invalid treaty in a brigandish manner at the point of bayonet and unilaterally announced it.
					
					 The appeal said: Japan is waiting for a chance to stage a comeback to Korea, promoting visits to "Yasukuni Shrine", a symbol of aggression, shamelessly tampering with history and pursuing the moves to grab Tok Islet, etc. far from making due apology and reparation for its past crimes still today. Moreover, it is persistently standing in the way of the reunification of the Korean nation.
					
					 Noting that the reality urgently requires the 70 million Koreans to get united close as one and force Japan to redeem all its past crimes and thus defend the dignity and sovereignty of the nation and accomplish the historic cause of national reunification, the above-said organizations made the following appeal to all Koreans in the north and the south and overseas: 
					
					 Let us force Japan to settle all its past crimes and demonstrate the independence and dignity of the nation under the uplifted banner of "By our nation itself."
					
					 The year 2010 marks the lapse of a century since the "Korea-Japan Annexation Treaty" was fabricated by the Japanese imperialists.
					
					 Let all Koreans in the north and the south and abroad fix the year 2010 as a "year of nationwide anti-Japanese joint struggle" and wage a dynamic mass movement for forcing Japan to make apology and reparation for its hideous past crimes.
					
					 Let us decisively frustrate Japan's moves to revive militarism and stage a comeback to Korea. 
					
					 Let us never allow such treachery of the "five traitors of 1905" of modern type as sycophancy and reliance upon foreign forces.
					
					 Let us dynamically advance the June 15 era for reunification through the great unity of the nation.
					
					 Whoever is a member of Tangun's nation truly loving the country and nation and aspiring after reunification should place the national interests above anything else and unite close irrespective of ideology, ism, political view and religious belief to achieve independent reunification, peace and prosperity.
					
					 Let us foil the anti-reunification acts of fostering distrust and confrontation between fellow countrymen and achieve national unity on the principle of promoting each other's confidence and reconciliation.

articles.title: Independence Day of Poland Observed
articles.content:
Independence Day of Poland Observed
 Pyongyang, November 17 (KCNA) -- A film show was held at the Taedonggang Diplomatic Corps Club on Tuesday to mark the independence day of Poland.
					 Attending it were Ryu Sung Rim, vice-chairman of the DPRK-Poland Friendship Association, officials concerned, working people in the city of Pyongyang, and Tomasz Szczepanowski, charge d'affaires ad interim, and staff members of the Polish embassy here.
					
					 The participants watched a Polish feature film.

articles.title: Profitable Lag Developed
articles.content:
Profitable Lag Developed
 Pyongyang, November 17 (KCNA) -- The complex lag developed by the Research Institute of City Management Science under the State Academy of Sciences is highly appreciated by the users for its economic effectiveness.
					 The lag is helpful to the protection of environment as it is made with various sorts of plastic wastes as raw materials.
					
					 It raises the lagging effectiveness two times or more, its production cost being low.
					
					 According to researchers, the application of the lagging materials to buildings and dwellings raises the indoor temperature by over six degrees centigrade as against the pre-application and increases construction tempo remarkably. 
					
					 The lag was used as roof and wall lagging materials when the Taedongmun Cinema was reconstructed.

articles.title: Telemedicine Service Realized
articles.content:
Telemedicine Service Realized
 Pyongyang, November 17 (KCNA) -- A telemedicine service has been realized between Pyongyang and provinces in the DPRK.
					 Recently the Ministry of Public Health and Kim Man Yu Hospital have solved the technological problems arising in introducing the telemedicine service.
					
					 It thus makes it possible to exchange examination result and image data by functional diagnosis equipment between Pyongyang and provincial people's hospitals and to accurately diagnose and treat patients in local hospitals without sending them to central hospitals.
					
					 And local medical workers can receive a telemedicine education from professors, doctors and competent medical workers of central hospitals without leaving working site.
					
					 Now the telemedicine service system is on a normal operation.

articles.title: KCNA Issue Interim Report on Construction of Huichon Power Station
articles.content:
KCNA Issue Interim Report on Construction of Huichon Power Station
 Pyongyang, November 17 (KCNA) -- The Korean Central News Agency Monday issued a detailed report on the heroic feats the creators of the "Huichon Speed" have performed by dynamically waging a general offensive through the display of the spirit of unconditionally carrying out the policies of the Workers' Party of Korea, patriotic devotion and the might of single-minded unity and thereby adorning the nation's history with great events. 
					 According to it, the power station is the largest-ever in scale and the volume of the work to be done among the power stations that have sprung up over the last more than two decades and its builders, accordingly, resolved to complete this gigantic nature-remaking project in a matter of three years under any circumstances, the project which would take more than ten years at ordinary pace.
					
					 Servicepersons of the People's Army and builders are simultaneously pushing forward the construction of two huge dams, waterway tunnels with a total length of more than scores of kilometers, roads and power stations, etc. in vast areas extending dozens of kms.
					
					 Groundwork for dams was wound up in the main in a matter of five months after the groundbreaking though it would have taken several years at ordinary pace, paving the way for full-scale dam building.  Concrete tamping of Korean style made progress in three dimensions, boosting the speed of tamping at dams more than six times. This led to creating a fresh speed in the drive for effecting a great surge.
					
					 Soldier-builders succeeded in bringing winches and compressors, weighing several hundreds of tons in total, to sloping areas more than 45 degrees by displaying popular heroism in an effort to complete the project at the earliest possible date.
					
					 With the introduction of new technologies steady signal successes have been made in the tunneling. As a result, the tunneling of a pit with a total length of almost 6 kms has reached its final phase and the building of almost all the main waterway tunnels is going full steam ahead.
					
					 The soldier-builders engaged in the construction of Huichon Power Station No. 1 and a waterway tunnel became the first to drive through the main waterway tunnel in their charge on October 29.
					
					 Officials, working people and young people from different parts of the country volunteered to work there, creating "Huichon time" in every work site by racing against time.
					
					It was hard, indeed, from the outset to build a road along the Toyang Ridge 1,500 meters above the sea level despite the extremely unfavorable natural conditions.
					
					Members of the shock brigade have removed more than 103,000 cubic meters of earth and over 54,000 cubic meters of rock and successfully carried out such projects as building more than 38,000 cubic meters of retaining walls, 90 culverts and dozens of bridges through their heroic endeavors. As a result, they completed the road construction in a matter of just 12 days which would have taken more than three years at ordinary pace.
					
					 The introduction of advanced science and technology has greatly contributed to the creation of the "Huichon Speed".
					
					 A powerful technical force made up of scientists and technicians from scientific and educational institutions and industrial establishments has settled problems arising in the projects their own way.
					
					General Secretary Kim Jong Il revisited Huichon in September last and called the rare construction speed created through leap forward and innovations effected every second and minute the "Huichon Speed," a new Chollima speed based on the revolutionary soldier spirit. This is an expression of his profound trust in the servicepersons and people in the DPRK glorifying the era of the great surge.
					
					Still arduous is the way before the builders of the above-said power station determined to complete the gigantic nature-remaking project in Huichon by 2012, the centenary of birth of President
						 Kim Il Sung. But they are making an all-out charge full of conviction of sure victory in order to live up to the trust and expectation of the Party.

articles.title: U.S. and S. Korean "OPLAN 5029" Blamed
articles.content:
U.S. and S. Korean "OPLAN 5029" Blamed
 Pyongyang, November 17 (KCNA) -- The U.S. and the south Korean bellicose forces are said to have recently rounded off the "OPLAN 5029".
					 The plan is a despicable product of the anti-DPRK policy pursued by the above-said forces that are running amuck with bloodshot eyes to find a pretext for a war of aggression on the DPRK and an extension of their strategy for a war against it.
					
					 The U.S. already worked out detailed operation plans under various simulated conditions according to the strategy for a war against the DPRK.
					
					 Such operation plans as "OPLAN 5026", "OPLAN 5027" and "OPLAN 5030" crafted by the U.S. are scenarios of phased war against the DPRK which are all linked one another.
					
					 As for the "OPLAN 5029", it was rounded off by the U.S.-south Korea "Combined Forces Command" and the "joint chiefs of staff" of the south Korean forces pursuant to the strategic guidelines agreed at the 38th U.S.-south Korea "annual security consultative meeting".
					
					 This plan is beset with bigger danger than the preceding ones.
					
					 The U.S. and south Korea oft-cited "the north's invasion of the south" when they mapped out the plans for aggression on the DPRK in the past period. But, this time they completely threw away even the signboard of the "invasion of the south" which they put up for mere form's sake in the past.
					
					 This means that they more openly intensified the moves to provoke a war on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists and the south Korean forces are stepping up arms buildup to put the plan for war of aggression into practice. They are contemplating introducing latest nuclear war means and precision striking weapons into south Korea while getting hell-bent on the war exercises including a large-scale landing operation. Armed provocations are being openly perpetrated in the West Sea of Korea. All of these are part of the war preparations being made by the U.S. and south Korea to finally confirm the feasibility of the strategy and operation plan for war of aggression on the DPRK which had already been rounded off.
					
					 What is ridiculous is that the U.S. and the south Korean warlike forces misrepresent the "OPLAN 5029" as one to cope with the "emergency situation" of someone.
					
					 It is intolerable and thrice-cursed crime that they rounded off the scenario for a war of aggression under the simulated situations which is neither possible nor imaginable for the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. and the south Korean reactionaries are foolish enough to dream that they can put the whole Korean Peninsula under their control and destroy the ideology and system chosen by the people of the DPRK, while expecting any "change" from it.
					
					 Through protracted and arduous struggle the servicepersons and people of the DPRK became to value more than their lives Korean-style socialism centered on the popular masses, which is most advantageous in the world, and they do not hesitate to devote even their lives to defend it.
					
					 Invincible is the Korean-style socialist system in which the leader, the army and the people have formed a harmonious whole.
					
					 The "emergency situation" and the like much touted by the U.S. and the south Korean warmongers are just aimed to invent a pretext of the war of aggression on the DPRK in a deliberate way.
					
					 The reality goes to prove that the U.S. and the south Korean authorities remain unchanged in their wild ambition for aggression and hostile policy towards the DPRK.
					
					 The DPRK will further bolster its self-defensive deterrent to defend its socialist system.

articles.title: Japanese Reactionaries' Sabre Rattling Blasted
articles.content:
Japanese Reactionaries' Sabre Rattling Blasted
 Pyongyang, November 17 (KCNA) -- The Japanese reactionaries painted the 2nd "combined military exercise of the 'Self-Defence Forces,'" a large-scale landing operation maneuver staged in Japan, as one aimed at "boosting their capability for defensive battle" but this rhetoric is nothing but a version of a slogan for reinvasion and a theory calling for rounding off their war preparations. Rodong Sinmun Tuesday observes this in a signed commentary.
					 It goes on:
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries staged the above-said exercise this time with the biggest-ever number of troops and equipment involved, kicking up a war atmosphere. This clearly suggests that their moves for reinvasion are being accelerated at a graver phase in real earnest. 
					
					 But for the intention to stage a comeback to Korea Japan would not have felt the need to round off the landing operation presupposing an attack.
					
					 Japan's staging large-scale military maneuver while putting spurs to the arms race and arms build-up is designed to launch reinvasion for conquering Asia. The Japanese militarists are set to kick off reinvasion of Asia in Korea.
					
					 The "5055" operation plan worked out by the Japan Ministry of Defence regards it as a strategy of the SDF for military actions to let it participate in another Korean war in support of the U.S. in "contingency" on the Korean Peninsula and undertake military actions against the DPRK. The above-said joint military exercise was staged in line with the above-said plan. 
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries seek to stage a comeback to Korea anytime under the pretext of non-existent "threat" from the DPRK. This is, however, as foolish an act as digging their own graves.

articles.title: Dynamic General Advance Urged
articles.content:
Dynamic General Advance Urged
 Pyongyang, November 17 (KCNA) -- Leading newspapers Tuesday editorially call upon everyone to rush ahead towards the victory of building a great prosperous and powerful nation with redoubled courage and full of confidence, with great pride of making revolution as a member of Kim Il Sung's nation under the leadership of the great Workers' Party of Korea.
					 Rodong Sinmun stresses that it is the unanimous will of the Korean people sharing the same intention with the WPK to work hard in high spirits with firm confidence in victory of great surge and thus open the gate to a great prosperous and powerful nation without fail.
					
					The legendary long journey of patriotic devotion traveled by General Secretary Kim Jong Il, who is making tireless efforts to bring earlier the rosy morrow when a thriving nation is built, gives confidence in sure victory, optimism and inexhaustible strength and courage to the army and people and serves as a driving force considerably increasing the speed of our advance, it says, and goes on:
					
					 The revolutionary optimism is the working spirit peculiar to the people who pave the way for the brilliant future while overcoming trials.
					
					 Today the army and people of the DPRK are dashing towards the eminence of a thriving nation with high ambition, loudly singing the songs of revolution and struggle.
					
					 Epoch-making events take place one after another in the DPRK today when the storm of a great revolutionary surge, unprecedented in the history of the prospering country, is raging. All sectors of socialist construction are rushing ahead on the orbit of constant upturn. This stirring reality further enhances our people's mental power for national self-dependence and instills them with the steadfast confidence that they can fling open the gate to a thriving nation in the near future.
					
					 A thriving nation is sure to be built, and the day when the Korean people will lead a wealthy life with nothing to envy in the world is coming nearer.
					
					 Minju Joson stresses that all the people should steadily renew the speed and records of the 100-day campaign under the leadership of the WPK and thus strikingly demonstrate once again the revolutionary stamina of heroic Korea rushing forward like the wind on the Songun Chollima.

articles.title: Improved Inter-Korean Relations Demanded
articles.content:
Improved Inter-Korean Relations Demanded
 Pyongyang, November 17 (KCNA) -- It is a prerequisite for national reunification and an urgent task for solving the national problem to achieve reconciliation, unity and cooperation between the north and the south and develop their relationship, Rodong Sinmun stresses in a signed article Tuesday.
					 It is because this comes up as the pressing task which brooks no further delay in view of the requirements of the June 15 era of reunification and the common interests of the nation or in light of the demands of the prevailing situation, the article says, and goes on:
					
					 We took such various measures for inter-Korean reconciliation and cooperation as having solved the important problems for the resumption of tourism of Mt. Kumgang and Kaesong, revitalization of the work in the Kaesong Industrial Zone and reunion of separated families and relatives at Mt. Kumgang resort with the autumn festival as an occasion. Those magnanimous measures came from the patriotic desire to improve the deteriorated inter-Korean relations by any means and develop the movement for national reunification.
					
					 All the fellow countrymen have fully supported these just measures taken by the DPRK to dispel pent-up misunderstanding and distrust and improve the relations between the north and the south while urging the south Korean authorities to respond to them without any condition.
					
					 However, prevailing in south Korea is the serious situation quite contrary to the desire and demand of the fellow countrymen.
					
					 It is impossible to normalize the north-south relations under such condition that one side incites confrontation against its dialogue partner, distrusting it and even perpetrates military provocations. There will be nothing but war between the north and the south when they are hostile to each other and the military tension gets aggravated.
					
					 Whether the inter-Korean relations will get improved or aggravated depends entirely on the attitude of the south Korean authorities. It is utterly absurd to insist on the confrontation with poor discrimination and obsessed with outdated conception while failing to squarely see the desire of the fellow countrymen for the improvement of inter-Korean relations, which will lead to a wide avenue for the independent reunification, peace and prosperity, and the trend of the times towards dialogue and detente. Such rash deed will certainly bring bitter regret and catastrophe only to the confrontation elements.
					
					 We will strive for the improvement of the inter-Korean relations in the future, too.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun on Unshakable Faith in Socialism
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun on Unshakable Faith in Socialism
Pyongyang, November 17 (KCNA) -- The army and people of the DPRK will as ever fully demonstrate their dignity and honor as revolutionaries who have taken the lead in paving the road of victory of socialism under the banner of the Juche, the banner of Songun, holding President
					 Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il in high esteem. Rodong Sinmun Tuesday says this in a signed article.
					 It goes on:
					
					 The firm faith of the army and people of the DPRK in socialism finds a vivid manifestation in firmly adhering to the ideology and line of the DPRK and the Korean-style revolutionary mode and mercilessly frustrating the reactionary offensive of the imperialists under the uplifted banner of Songun and displaying patriotic devotion and popular heroism in the on-going general offensive to open the gate to a thriving nation. 
					
					 Remaining unchanged is the conviction of the army and people of the DPRK that the great Juche idea and the line and policies of the Workers' Party of Korea, its embodiments, and the Korean-style revolutionary mode chosen and maintained by them are the best. 
					
					 All the servicepersons and people are dynamically advancing toward a bright morrow true to the Songun leadership of the WPK, single-mindedly united around it. This is a clear proof of the advantages and the tremendous vitality of Korean-style socialism and an expression of their unshakable will to share destiny with it to the last.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK are dealing merciless blows at the imperialists, countering their reckless moves with the toughest measures. The Korean people are growing stronger in their faith and will to protect socialism to the last from the ever-more undisguised moves of the U.S. imperialists and settle accounts with them without fail, holding aloft the banner of Songun.
					
					 They are dashing ahead like the wind, intensifying the drive for effecting a new great revolutionary surge with a firm resolution and great enthusiasm to open the gate to a great prosperous and powerful nation by 2012, the centenary of birth of Kim Il Sung. Exceptionally strong is their revolutionary determination to attain higher goals and advance faster for a rosy future of a rich and powerful country and build a thriving socialist nation on this land to be envied by the whole world.
					
					The whole country is swept by a high-pitched drive for a great surge and great changes are reported from all the fronts for the building of a thriving nation.
					
					 Korean-style socialism is sure to triumph and rosier is the future of the country thanks to the tested and seasoned leadership of the great WPK and the revolutionary army and people grown to be strong in faith and mental power.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Songun Leadership Exploits Lauded
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Songun Leadership Exploits Lauded
Pyongyang, November 17 (KCNA) -- Jorge Pereyra, general secretary of the Extraordinary Congress Communist Party of Argentina, issued a statement on Nov. 8 on the occasion of the 18th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's assumption of supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army.
					 Noting that the DPRK held Kim Jong Il in high esteem as the supreme commander of the armed forces on Dec. 24, 1991, the general secretary said that he has trained the KPA as an invincible army, frustrating the attempts of the imperialists at aggression and guaranteeing the security of socialist Korea.
					
					 In the days of defending socialism on which hinged the destiny of the country Kim Jong Il unrolled a grandiose plan for building  a thriving nation and laid a springboard for doing so, he said, adding that a new era of building a thriving nation has come to the DPRK.
					
					 He stressed that the party would join the Korean people in celebrating the day.

articles.title: Kim Jong Suk's Exploits Praised
articles.content:
Kim Jong Suk's Exploits Praised
 Pyongyang, November 17 (KCNA) -- Jorge Kreyness, international secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Argentina, issued a statement on Nov. 7 on the occasion of the 92nd anniversary of birth of Kim Jong Suk, anti-Japanese heroine. 
					 Noting that Dec. 24 is a significant day when Kim Jong Suk, who is always revered by the Korean people as the anti-Japanese heroine, was born, he said that she took part in the anti-Japanese armed struggle in her early days when the nation was undergoing sufferings under the military occupation of Japan, making a great contribution to achieving Korea's liberation, and performed great exploits for the cause of building a new society after the country's liberation.
					
					 The greatest of her exploits was that she devotedly defended the headquarters of the Korean revolution and provided a firm guarantee for ensuring that the cause of President Kim Il Sung is carried forward generation after generation, he said, adding that the life and exploits of Kim Jong Suk remain shining as ever along with eternally prospering socialist Korea.

articles.title: Books and Collections of Poems Published in Foreign Countries
articles.content:
Books and Collections of Poems Published in Foreign Countries
Pyongyang, November 17 (KCNA) -- Books and collections of poems were recently brought out in different countries to commemorate the centenary of birth of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The Sahayogi Publishing House of Nepal, the Publishing House of the Russian Association for Development of Friendship and Cooperation with Foreign Countries, a company of Thailand and a publishing house of Bulgaria published more than ten varieties of books and collections of poems carrying the portraits of smiling Kim Il Sung, the portraits of General Secreatry Kim Jong Il and photos of the three commanders of Mt. Paektu.
					
					 C. P. Mainali, general secretary of the Central Committee of the Nepal Communist Party (Marxist-Leninist), in his book "Sun Remains Shining Forever" wrote that thanks to Kim Il Sung's birth the Korean people had the greatest fortune of holding him in high esteem as the great sun of the nation for the first time in its history spanning thousands of years. He gave a detailed account of Kim Il Sung's patriotic and revolutionary family.
					
					 Semyonov, manager of the above-mentioned Russian publishing house, in his book "Leader of 21st Century" praised Kim Jong Il as an incarnation of benevolence, a father of all people, a guardian of peace in the 21st century, an eternal lodestar of independence and a great political elder glorifying the new century.
					
					 Reggie Ranatunge, who was chairman of the Sri Lanka-People's Korea Friendship Association, Zabed Ansari, secretary general of the Karachi Branch of the Pakistan-Korea Friendship Association, and Alejandro Cao de Benos, chairman of the Korean Friendship Association headquartered in Spain, in their books "Kim Il Sung's Nation Optimistic about Future", "DPRK; Option for Peace" and "DPRK, Bulwark of Songun" highly lauded the immortal exploits Kim Jong Il has performed by firmly protecting the sovereignty and dignity of the country and the nation and bringing about a new turn in building a thriving nation with the might of Songun.
					
					 Meanwhile, Gennadi Sharin, a Russian composer, and Manju Ratna Sakya, chairman of the Nepal Journalist Association, in their books "Leader Kim Jong Il and the Korean Renaissance" and "Music and the Future of Pyongyang" expressed belief that the glorious Korean revolution would win victory after victory with songs as it was started with songs and has advanced with them.
					
					 Vasilka Nikiforova, chief of the "Kim Il Sung Library" in Sofia, authored book "Kim Il Sung's Korea and Its 60 Years", Aleksandr Brezhnev, a Russian poet, wrote a collection of poems "Great Succession", several poets produced a collection of poems "Bright Sun of Humankind" and Dipak Sharma, chairman of the Nepalese Young Poets' Forum, a collection of poems "Dedicated to the Three Great Persons of Mt. Paektu." The above-said book and collections which contain at least 100 poems highly praised the undying feats performed by the three commanders of Mt. Paektu.

articles.title: Double-Cropping Done by Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Double-Cropping Done by Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, November 17 (KCNA) -- It was on a Sunday of June, Juche 53 (1964).
					An official who visited the residence of General Secretary Kim Jong Il was perplexed by the unimaginable scenery of the garden.
					
					 There grew thick trees of economic value in the garden and grain crops, industrial crops, vegetables as well as fodder grass in patches.
					
					Sowing soybean as the second crop after wheat in a patch, Kim Jong Il kindly invited the official to join in sowing with a hoe.
					
					 The leader said that as the after-crop beans sprout leaves not so much, the close planting would not have influence on the sunshine over the crops, indicating the plant-interval to him.
					
					 When the official said that it was likely to harvest two tons of soybean per hectare, the leader stated with confidence that he anticipated three tons, not two tons and he would reap 6.5 tons altogether in the first and second crops.
					
					 The official was full of admiration. The leader told the official that he had fixed various species of crops as double-cropping ones and done experimental cultivation for a few years, stressing that the reserves for increasing the grain production were double-cropping and close-planting.
					
					 The official keenly realized that the patches were not simple experimental ones but a breeding farm for the development of agriculture of the country.

articles.title: Informacion detallada de ATCC sobre obra de la central de Huichon
articles.content:
Informacion detallada de ATCC sobre obra de la central de Huichon
Pyongyang, 17 de noviembre (ATCC) -- La Agencia Telegrafica Central de Corea publico el dia 16 la informacion detallada sobre los meritos heroicos de los creadores de la "velocidad de Huichon", que registran en los anales de la patria un gigantesco evento desplegando audazmente la ofensiva general con la disposicion de materializar absoluta e incondicionalmente las orientaciones del partido, la abnegacion patriotica y el poderio de la unidad monolitica.
					Segun la nota, la construccion de la Central Hidroelectrica de Huichon, que es la mas grande entre las centrales construidas durante mas de 20 anos ultimos tanto en el tamano como en el volumen de trabajos, es una obra de transformacion de la naturaleza que debe ser terminada incondicionalmente dentro de 3 anos aunque normalmente requiere mas de 10 anos.
					
					Los militares del ejercito popular y los constructores construyen simultaneamente en la vasta zona de centenares de ries (10 ri equivale a 4 km) dos diques enormes, los tuneles de paso del agua de decenas de kilometros de largo, las carreteras, los edificios de la central, etc.
					
					A los 5 meses del inicio de la obra, quedo terminada principalmente la cimentacion de diques, que demoraba antes varios anos, permitiendo impulsar en etapa crucial la edificacion de la armadura de los mismos.
					
					En tanto, se creo la nueva velocidad de avance en busca del gran auge al aumentarse mas de 6 veces que lo establecido la velocidad del relleno de diques gracias a las faenas con hormigon que se realizaron al estilo coreano y de modo tridimensional.
					
					Para acortar al maximo el plazo de la obra, los constructores militares lograron colocar en las cuestas montanosas de mas de 45o de inclinacion los cabrestantes y los compresores de centenares de toneladas en total haciendo uso de su heroismo colectivo.
					
					Esta en la fase final la perforacion de la galeria de trabajo de casi 15 ries de largo gracias al incremento del resultado de esta labor en que influyeron la invencion y la introduccion de nuevas tecnologias. 
					
					Otra innovacion se registra en la construccion de tuneles principales que se libra en gran escala en casi todas las galerias.
					
					Los constructores militares lograron el 29 de octubre el exito de ser los primeros en perforar el tramo del tunel principal a su cargo en el campo de construccion de la Central Hidroelectrica No.1 de Huichon.
					
					Los funcionarios, los trabajadores y los jovenes, provenientes de distintas localidades del pais, crean en sus respectivos campos de construccion el "tiempo de Huichon" que permitira terminar la obra con un adelanto de dias, meses y anos.
					
					La construccion de la carretera en el muy accidentado pico Toyang con una altura de mil 500 metros sobre el nivel del mar fue desde su inicio una batalla con la naturaleza insolente.
					
					Pero, esta obra, de que se decia demorar mas de 3 anos, termino milagrosamente solo a los 12 dias gracias a la lucha heroica de los miembros de la brigada de trabajo quienes construyeron con exito los muros de contencion de mas de 38 mil metros cubicos, 90 conductos subterraneos y decenas de puentes deshaciendo mas de 103 mil metros cubicos de tierra y mas de 54 mil metros cubicos de roca.
					
					La ciencia y la tecnica avanzadas dieron buen impulso a la creacion de la "velocidad de Huichon".
					
					El competente personal tecnico formado por los cientificos y los tecnicos de los organos cientificos y docentes, fabricas y empresas esta resolviendo al estilo coreano los problemas surgidos en la obra.
					
					Al volver a visitar en septiembre ultimo a Huichon, el Dirigente Kim Jong Il hizo nombrar esa gigantesca velocidad de construccion, que registra saltos e innovaciones a cada minuto y segundo, como la "velocidad de Huichon", o sea, la nueva velocidad de Chollima (legendario corcel que de un salto llega a mil ries) que se basa en el espiritu revolucionario de los militares. Esto es la expresion de su gran confianza depositada en el ejercito y el pueblo de Corea que glorifican la epoca de gran auge.
					
					Aunque sigue siendo arduo el camino que les falta por recorrer a los constructores para terminar su obra hasta el ano 2012 en que se acogera el centenario de natalicio del Presidente Kim Il Sung, ellos libran la ofensiva general confiando en su triunfo y guardando en el corazon la confianza y la esperanza del partido cifradas en si mismos.

articles.title: ATCC critica el "plan operacional 5029" que persigue la Guerra
articles.content:
ATCC critica el "plan operacional 5029" que persigue la guerra
Pyongyang, 17 de noviembre (ATCC) -- Recientemente, Estados Unidos y las fuerzas belicistas surcoreanas dieron toque final al llamado "plan operacional 5029".
					Este plan es un producto repugnante de la politica hostil a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y la continuacion de la estrategia de agredirla de aquellos que estan tratando desesperadamente de buscar un pretexto para ponerla en practica.
					
					Partiendo de esa estrategia, EE.UU. ya ha inventado los planes detallados del particular tomando en cuenta varios casos.
					
					Los "planes operacionales" como el "5026", el "5027" y el "5030" son los guiones por etapas de la guerra anti-RPDC vinculados uno con el otro.
					
					El "5029" fue completado en la "Comandancia de las Fuerzas Combinadas" EE.UU.-Sur de Corea y la "Junta de los Jefes de Estado Mayor" del ejercito surcoreano segun la orientacion estrategica acordada en la 38a "reunion consultiva anual para la seguridad" entre ambas partes.
					
					Este plan resulta el mas peligroso que los anteriores.
					
					Cada vez que EE.UU. y el Sur de Corea inventaban un plan de la agresion a la RPDC, lo justificaban con la supuesta "agresion al Sur por esta". Pero, esta vez, no se han tomado siquiera la molestia de utilizar ese pretexto.
					
					Esto quiere decir que se tornaron mas abiertas sus maniobras para provocar la guerra en la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					Ahora, los imperialistas norteamericanos y el ejercito surcoreano aceleran el aumento armamentista para realizar su plan. 
					
					Especificamente, pretenden introducir en el territorio surcoreano los equipos de punta para la guerra nuclear y las armas de ataque a precision y ejercitan con afan las operaciones belicas incluyendo el desembarco de gran envergadura. 
					
					No por casualidad, incurren abiertamente en la provocacion militar en el Mar Oeste de Corea. 
					
					Todo esto forma parte de sus preparativos que se impulsan para confirmar finalmente las posibilidades reales de la estrategia de guerra y el plan operacional anti-RPDC, trazados ya por EE.UU. y el Sur de Corea.
					
					Lo ridiculo del caso es que ellos mienten que el "plan operacional 5029" fue elaborado para hacer frente a la "situacion de emergencia" de alguien.
					
					Resulta un acto criminal nunca perdonable el hecho de que ellos completaron ese plan suponiendo esa situacion imposible de advenir ni imaginar en la RPDC.
					
					Es vana la ilusion de EE.UU. y los reaccionarios surcoreanos de ocupar toda la Peninsula Coreana y eliminar la idea y el sistema optados por el pueblo de la RPDC aprovechando el supuesto "cambio" en ella.
					
					Durante su larga y ardua lucha, el ejercito y el pueblo coreanos llegaron a apreciar mas que su vida el socialismo al estilo coreano, centrado en las masas populares y mas ventajoso en el mundo, y dedican sin vacilacion su vida para defenderlo.
					
					Es invencible el regimen socialista al estilo coreano donde el lider, el ejercito y el pueblo estan unidos de cuerpo y alma.
					
					La habladuria de la "situacion de emergencia" no es otra que una maniobra que parte de la intencion de procurar el pretexto de la guerra de agresion a la RPDC.
					
					La realidad muestra claramente que no ha cambiado en nada la ambicion agresiva y la politica hostil anti-RPDC de EE.UU. y las autoridades surcoreanas.
					
					La RPDC fortalecera aun mas su disuasivo de autodefensa para salvaguardar su regimen socialista.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun condena ejercicio de desembarco en Japon
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun condena ejercicio de desembarco en Japon
 Pyongyang, 17 de noviembre (ATCC) -- En estos dias, los reaccionarios japoneses justifican el segundo "ejercicio militar conjunto de las〈Fuerzas de Autodefensa〉", que se libro en Japon en gran dimension para ejercitar la operacion de desembarco, arguyendo que el mismo fue para la supuesta "elevacion de la combatividad defensiva".
					  En un comentario individual difundido hoy, el diario Rodong Sinmun califico ese embuste de cara trasera de la consigna llamando a la nueva agresion y de doctrina para ultimar los preparativos para la guerra.
					
					  En el referido ejercicio de desembarco tomaron parte colosales fuerzas armadas, cuyo numero no tiene precedentes, dando el clima de guerra, comienza el comentario y prosigue:
					
					  Esto insinua claramente que entraron en la etapa crucial las maniobras de los reaccionarios japoneses para retomar el camino de agresion.
					
					  Si Japon no tuviera la intencion de reagredir a Asia, no necesitaria ejercitar a perfeccion la operacion de desembarco que logicamente supone el ataque.
					
					  No obstante, recurre al aumento armamentista ampliando los gastos militares, para dar inicio a la agresion para la conquista de Asia mediante el ataque a Corea.
					
					  Segun el plan operacional "5055" trazado por el Ministerio de Defensa de Japon, la estrategia de accion militar de las "Fuerzas de Autodefensa" consiste en participar en la guerra coreana para ayudar a Estados Unidos en el "tiempo de emergencia" de la Peninsula Coreana y realizar las operaciones contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea. Parte tambien de este plan el polemico ejercicio realizado por las "Fuerzas de Autodefensa".
					
					  Los reaccionarios japoneses intentan reagredir a la RPDC en cualquier momento pretextando la fantasmal "amenaza" proveniente de ella. 
					
					Pero, tal conducta de ellos es una estupidez que les conducira a la autodestruccion.

articles.title: Entidades del Norte y el Sur de Corea publican llamamiento
articles.content:
Entidades del Norte y el Sur de Corea publican llamamiento 
Pyongyang, 17 de noviembre (ATCC) -- Con motivo del aniversario 104 de la firma forzosa del "Tratado de los 5 puntos de Ulsa (1905)", el Consejo de la Reunificacion de la Nacion de Tangun de la parte nortena y el Consejo de la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Nacion de Tangun de la parte surena hicieron publico el dia 17 un llamamiento conjunto.
					El documento recuerda que desde cuando el imperialismo japones invento de modo bandidesco con bayonetas el ilegal e invalido "Tratado de los 5 puntos de Ulsa" y lo proclamo unilateralmente, la nacion coreana, que tenia la historia de cinco milenios, perdio por completo la soberania del pais y se vio obligada al destino de esclavitud bajo la cruel dominacion colonial de ello.
					
					Revela que hasta la fecha el pais isleno se entrega a la visita al "Santuario Yasukuni", simbolo de la agresion, la descarada tergiversacion de la historia, las maniobras de usurpacion del islote Tok, etc. lejos de pedir disculpas y hacer la indemnizacion por sus crimenes cometidos en el pasado, acecha solo la oportunidad de reagresion a Corea y obstaculiza tercamente la reunificacion de la nacion coreana.
					
					La realidad demanda a los 70 millones de coreanos unirse compactamente para liquidar hasta el fin los crimenes cometidos por el imperialismo japones en el pasado, defender la dignidad y la soberania de la nacion y alcanzar la causa historica de la reunificacion de la patria, subraya el llamamiento y exhorta a todos los coreanos del Norte, el Sur y en ultramar como sigue:
					
					Manifestemos la soberania y la dignidad de la nacion al liquidar estrictamente los crimenes de Japon cometidos en el pasado bajo la bandera de "Entre nosotros, los connacionales".
					
					2010 es el ano en que se cumplira el centenario de la invencion del "Tratado de anexion de Corea a Japon" por el imperialismo japones.
					
					Que todos los coreanos del Norte, el Sur y en ultramar definan 2010 como "ano de la lucha comun antijaponesa pannacional" y desplieguen valientemente la campana masiva para recibir la disculpa y la indemnizacion sobre los tremendos crimenes de Japon cometidos en el pasados.
					
					Frustremos rotundamente el resurgimiento del militarismo japones y sus maniobras de reagresion.
					
					No perdonemos jamas las maniobras vendepatrias de los "5 traidores de Ulsa" que persiguen ahora el servilismo a las grandes potencias y la dependencia de las fuerzas extranjeras.
					
					Impulsemos vigorosamente con la gran unidad nacional la epoca de la reunificacion iniciada el 15 de junio.
					
					Logremos la reunificacion independiente, la paz y la prosperidad al unirnos compactamente anteponiendo el interes de la nacion por encima de las diferencias de ideologias e ideales, criterios politicos y creencias religiosas si es un miembro de la nacion de Tangun que sinceramente ama a la patria y la nacion y desea la reunificacion.
					
					Frustremos todas las conductas anti-reunificacion que persiguen la discordia y la confrontacion entre los connacionales y logremos la unidad de la nacion en el principio de fomentar la confianza y la reconciliacion mutuas.
